name: Mortalis

appearance.skin: Skeletal appearance with robes of midnight blue
appearance.eyes: Cold blue fire burning in his eye sockets
appearance.attire: Carries a scythe entwined with blooming flowers

personality.temperament: Sees beauty in endings and understands death as a doorway to a new beginning

notes: role_in_council: One of the six gods on the council of Elysion, overseeing the cycle of existence and the transition between life and death.
